title: Feed Amalgamator
description: Developed a news aggregation platform with advanced search and categorization features.
moreDetails: Integrated multiple news APIs to provide real-time updates. Implemented user-specific preferences for personalized news feeds and a responsive UI for seamless cross-device usage.

title: Automatic CI/CD Pipeline Generator (WIP)
description: CLI tool to parse repositories and generate CI/CD template based on tech stack detected.
moreDetails: Automates pipeline creation for faster project setup, supports integration with GitHub Actions, and provides modular templates for various frameworks. Includes built-in security checks.

title: CloudSync : Distributed Dropbox Clone
description: Fault-tolerant distributed system for syncing files across multiple devices.
moreDetails: Implemented a distributed architecture with replication and consistency guarantees using Raft protocol. Designed for low-latency file syncing and seamless recovery from node failures.

title: AutoBot
moreDetails: Developed SLAM-based navigation for precise pathfinding. Used Lidar data for obstacle detection and avoidance. Deployed real-time control algorithms for autonomous driving in indoor environments.

title: Quantum Gate Synthesis with Reinforcement Learning
description: Using Reinforcement Learning for Quantum Gate Synthesis.
moreDetails: Trained reinforcement learning agents to optimize quantum gate sequences, achieving high fidelity for two-qubit systems. Results validated using IBM Quantum simulators.

title: TritonHTTP
description: Personalized implementation of the HTTP Protocol.
moreDetails: Created a multi-threaded HTTP server supporting GET and POST requests with proper concurrency management. Enhanced server performance through optimized socket handling.
